Articles.Content: i had the game i lost it im not repaying 40$ (I Buyed it when it was 26) any mods (like hyperedit) PLEASE!!!

> 
> i had the game i lost it im not repaying 40$ (I Buyed it when it was 26) any mods (like hyperedit) PLEASE!!!

You should just be able to log into the store and redownload the game. You'll just have to start a new save if you've lost your save files.
Hi dewkiller72, where did you buy KSP? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Dang it I lost the game. >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

But yeah, if you bought the game from an official source, you should be able re-download it. Though you will likely lose your save and gamedata (unless you backed those up separately).

At this current time, Squad does not have an official way to download old versions of the game that are paid release copies. 

There is a link to non official downloads for the free versions of the game, please do not seek pirated copies or propose that on here, perhaps an email to squad directly could help. 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted%21%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted%21%29)
